full_summary:
_____________________________
arteiculating and telescopic boom lifts, self propelled vertical mast and scissor lifts
_____________________________

### RFC Statement

This solicitation, #WSC=F6B731846, supersedes E60HS -18LIFT. It is a request for a supply arrangement (SA) to procure artciculating and telescopic boom lifts, self-powered vertical mast lifts, and self-powered scissor lifts.

### Contracting Details

| Detail | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Procurement Reference** | WS4157368462 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4157368462 |
| **Publication Date** | 23-AUG-2023 |
| **Close Date (Closing Time)** | 28-JUN-2024 14:00 |
| **Trade Agreements** | WTO GPA, CFTA, Canada-UK TCA, Canada-Honduras, and others |

### Request for Supply Arrangement

The Canadian government invites bids from suppliers to establish a supply arrangement for  artciculating and telescopic boom lifts, self-powered vertical mast lifts, and self-powered scissor lifts. The scope of supply includes various models from leading manufacturers.

### Evaluation Criteria

* The lowest price shall be the determining factor for the award.

### Additional Details

* The bidding closing time has been amended; all bids must be submitted by 14:00 (EDT) on Jun 28, 2024.
* All bids received after the specified closing time shall be declared non-responsive.

The selected supplier shall provide the required equipment as stipulated in Annex A - Purchase Description. The procurement entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Contact Information

daniel.martial@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
